med.name: Histafree 180mg Tablet 10'S
med.des: HISTAFREE 180MG contains Fexofenadine which is an antihistamine
med.description: HISTAFREE 180MG is used in adults and adolescents of 12 years and older to relieve the symptoms that occur with long term allergic skin reactions such as itching, swelling, rashes and hay fever marked by sneezing, runny or blocked nose and itchy, red and watery eyes

1: Always take this medicine exactly as your doctor has told you
For adults and children aged 12 years and over the recommended dose is one tablet (120mg, 180 mg) daily. Take your tablet with water before a meal
For children aged 6 to 11 years of age the recommended dose is one tablet (30 mg) twice daily
Take your tablet with water before a meal
This medicine starts to relieve your symptoms within 1 hour and lasts for 24 hours
direction of usage.2: If you take too many HISTAFREE 180MG contact your doctor or the nearest hospital emergency department immediately
direction of usage.3: Do not take a double dose to make up for a forgotten tablet. Take the next dose at the usual time as prescribed by your doctor
direction of usage.4: Do not stop taking this medicine unless your doctor tells you to stop your treatment

warning: Are allergic to HISTAFREE 180MG, or any of the other ingredients of this medicine
Have problems with your liver or kidneys
Have or ever had heart disease, since this kind of medicine may lead to a fast or irregular heart beat

side-effect.serious: Swelling of the face, lips, tongue or throat and difficulty breathing, as these may be signs of a serious allergic reaction

med.name: AIR 180mg Tablet 10's
med.des: Air 180 Tablet is used for treating seasonal allergic conditions such as hay fever.
med.description: AIR 180mg is used in adults and adolescents of 12 years and older to relieve the symptoms that occur with long term allergic skin reactions such as itching, swelling, rashes and hay fever marked by sneezing, runny or blocked nose and itchy, red and watery eyes
